title: Emigre Book Signing, SF
content:
Gallery 16 & Emigre Present:   
   
Supermarket: Selected photos from the Supermarket book   
by Rudy VanderLans.   
   
April 15 - May 31, 2002   
   
Opening reception Friday, April 12, 6:00 - 9:00 PM   
Join us for a book signing & photo exhibition.   
   
Gallery 16   
1616 - 16th Street (at Kansas), 3rd Floor   
San Francisco, CA 94103   
Gallery hours: Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM   
415.626.7495   
   
See the SUPERMARKET cover image and sample spreads at:   
 [http://www.emigre.com/CBSUP.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014085616/http:/www.emigre.com/CBSUP.html)   
See the SUPERMARKET photo prints at:   
 [http://www.emigre.com/EmigrePrints.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014085616/http:/www.emigre.com/EmigrePrints.html)
author: Jared Benson
